IN PORT:  IDEL: LSIFO (380CST) 3.8MT / WORKING (24HRS): LSIFO(380CST) 5.2MT
ABOVE SPEED WARRANTY FOR GOOD WEATHER UPTO BEAUFORT WIND FORCE 4
AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND NO ADVERSE CURRENTS. WHILST MANEUVERING
IN/OUT OF PORTS, RIVERS, CANALS, NARROW WATERS, FOGS ETC VESSEL DOES BURN
LSMGO IN THE MAIN ENGINE.
ABOVE SPEED & CONS WARRANTY IS NOT APPLICABLE WHILE VESSEL
STEAMING/STAYING IN ECA AREAS/PORTS ON LSMGO.MGO USED WHEN
MANOUVERING IN/OUT PORTS, RIVERS, CANALS ETC
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
